title: Japanese Art by Thames and Hudson (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Japanese Art
Thames and Hudson | 1984 | ISBN: 0500201927 | English | 220 pages | PDF | 40 MB


The uniqueness of Japanese culture rests on the fact that, throughout its history, Japan has continually taken, adapted and transformed diverse influences, whether from Korea, China, the South Seas, Europe or America, into distinct traditions of its own. This book surveys the arts of Japan from the prehistoric period to the present, bringing together the results of the most recent research on the subject. Profusely illustrated with examples from all the arts--painting, calligraphy, the decorative arts and architecture--"Japanese Art" is a succinct and provocative overview of a fascinating culture
